content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Could you provide data on how many requests since 20mph schemes have rolled out across the City of Sheffield have been around cars speeding in 20mph areas.
Yours faithfully,
James Little

Dear Sheffield City Council,
To clarify the wording on this:
How many requests or reports to the council have there been to tackle speeding cars within designated 20mph zone areas, and if possible broken down by 20mph area the report mentions.
Yours faithfully,
James Little
